mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.vote_cnt, p.status, p.created_at, u.username, mc.name AS mainCategoryName, sc.name AS subCategoryName FROM post p INNER JOIN "user" u ON p.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN main_category mc ON p.main_category_id = mc.id INNER JOIN sub_category sc ON p.sub_category_id = sc.id WHERE p.status = 0 ORDER BY p.VOTE_CNT DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.vote_cnt, p.status, p.created_at, u.username, mc.name AS mainCategoryName, sc.name AS subCategoryName FROM post p INNER JOIN "user" u ON p.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN main_category mc ON p.main_category_id = mc.id INNER JOIN sub_category sc ON p.sub_category_id = sc.id WHERE p.status = 2 ORDER BY p.VOTE_CNT DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET status = 2 WHERE id = #{postId}
mapper.select: select daily_diet.id as id, daily_diet.diet_id as diet_id, main_category.name as main_category_name, sub_category.name as sub_category_name, diet.name as diet_name from daily_diet join diet on daily_diet.diet_id = diet.id join main_category on main_category_id = main_category.id join sub_category on sub_category_id = sub_category.id where #{date} = daily_diet.start_date or #{date} = daily_diet.end_date
